title: Helvetica with typewriter-style numerals "www.bureau347.com"
content:
![font identification](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123738im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/68863.jpg)   
   
Anyone knows what it is? I know its not helvetica but i love the style of the numbers and id really like to know what that is.   
   
Thank you very much!   
/Fredrik
author: arkiku

comments.content: So, its a customised american typewriter then?

I can't see the image for some reason, but when you said it looks like American Typewriter without the balls, [Tired Of Courier](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524123738/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ingrimayne/tiredofcourier/tired-of-courier-thin/) sprang to mind.   
   
 - Lex
